item.title: 20240724 Insertion Sort
item.description: Insertion sort Insertion sort works the way you might sort a hand of playing cards Start with an empty left hand; all cards are in a pile on the table With your right hand, pick up the first card in the pile Insert the card into the correct position in your left hand Pseudocode INSERTION-SORT(A, n) 1 for i = 2 to n 2 key = A[i] 3 // Insert A[i] into the sorted subarray A[1:i - 1] 4 j = i - 1 5 while j > 0 and A[j] > key 6 A[j + 1] = A[j] 7 j = j - 1 8 A[j + 1] = key Explain by a little example
